scripture.text: And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.
And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.
And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this fellow also was with him: for he is a Galil√¶an.
And Peter said, Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he yet spake, the cock crew.
